title.narrative: Enhancing Migration Management in Ethiopia and Promoting Voluntary Return and Reintegration of Ethiopians

description.narrative: The overall objective of the project is to enhance migration management in Ethiopia by building local capacities to address the root causes of irregular and secondary migration from Ethiopia and promoting voluntary return and reintegration of Ethiopians.

title.narrative: To enhance migration management in Ethiopia by building local capacities to address the root causes of irregular and secondary migration from Ethiopia and promoting voluntary return and reintegration of Ethiopians.

description.narrative:

# of youth at risk of trafficking and smuggling reduce their vulnerability with the livelihoods support provided under the project.
